Module com.github.sormuras.bach
Package com.github.sormuras.bach

Annotation Interface ProjectInfo.MainSpace

Enclosing class:
ProjectInfo
@Target({}) public static @interface ProjectInfo.MainSpace
Main space configuration.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String[]
    modulePaths
    Returns the module path elements for main modules.
    String[]
    modules
    Returns an array of path matcher patterns for finding main module declarations.
    ProjectInfo.Tweak[]
    tweaks
    Returns the additional main space arguments to be passed on a per-tool basis.

  • Element Details

    • modules

      String[] modules
      Returns an array of path matcher patterns for finding main module declarations.
      Returns:
      an array of path matcher patterns for finding main module declarations
      See Also:
      FileSystem.getPathMatcher(String)
      Default:
      {"**module-info.java"}

    • modulePaths

      String[] modulePaths
      Returns the module path elements for main modules.
      Returns:
      the module path elements for main modules
      Default:
      {".bach/external-modules"}

    • tweaks

      ProjectInfo.Tweak[] tweaks
      Returns the additional main space arguments to be passed on a per-tool basis.
      Returns:
      the additional main space arguments to be passed on a per-tool basis
      Default:
      {@com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="javac", option="-encoding", value={"UTF-8"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="javadoc", option="-encoding", value={"UTF-8"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", option="--compress", value={"2"}), @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", option="--no-header-files"), @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", option="--no-man-pages"), @com.github.sormuras.bach.ProjectInfo.Tweak(tool="jlink", option="--strip-debug")}
